mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Benson Lossing to John Augustine Washington III, 1858 August 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lossing, Benson John, 1813-1891
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Is involved in illustrating an article about Mount Vernon as it is of interest to the American people. Wants to visit to sketch objects that have not been drawn. The MVLA is in favor of such an article to assist with their fund raising. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Mount Vernon Ladies' Association (MVLA) collection
